segments.text: What a disaster with all that water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's full and spilling over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying dishes, ignoring it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's dripping down the cabinet doors too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on an unstable stool for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by reaching for some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll make even more mess with crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery now, someone will fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's clean and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing this kind of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
